title: Atomic Habits
notes: A great book about building good habits and breaking bad ones.
summary: This book discusses how small changes can lead to remarkable results.

title: Deep Work
notes: Focus on creating value through deep and focused work.
summary: The book explores strategies to achieve deep, focused work and minimize distractions.

title: The Alchemist
notes: A story about pursuing one's dreams and listening to the heart.
summary: A shepherd's journey to find treasure teaches life lessons.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
notes: History and evolution of humankind in an engaging narrative.
summary: The book covers how humans evolved and shaped the world.
